name: 'Net Descent
description:
NOTE: if you have problems playing on itch.io, you can also play it here: https://gamejolt.com/games/net-descent/639129

The alien browsers have abducted the Internet!

Lead Opera GX and his pal, Opera, to endlessy descend into their planet, Browsrium, to collect internet icons. Battle the alien browsers and make the high score!

Game made for Opera GX game jam.

Instructions

This game supports single and local co-op (press left or right to select in the Title window).

  • Player 1: left/right keys to move, down key to shoot.
  • Player 2: A and D keys to move, S to shoot.

FAQ/Tips

  • Jam version does not allow fullscreen in HTML5. Zoom into the browser window if you want it bigger!
  • You need to click the game window before pressing ENTER to enable sound on Chromium web browsers (Chrome, Opera, etc.) 
  • Space toggles music and sounds on/off.
  • There are separate high scores for single and co-op modes.

Credits

  • Web browser icons: https://iconduck.com/sets/browser-logos
  • Fonts: Retro Gaming (https://www.dafont.com/es/retro-gaming.font) and  Google Material Icons font (https://github.com/google/material-design-icons)
  • Everything else made by me.
